summary: The diff does not show the requested logo asset being added/overwritten at the required public path. Instead, it only modifies metadata/summary files, while describing additional UI/style changes (colors, logo sizing, object-fit) that were not requested and conflict with the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded logo image file to the frontend static assets so it is served at the exact path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., place/overwrite the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`) without modifying the image content.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff reports no added files (Added: 0) and only shows modifications to `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`. There is no actual file diff evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` was added/overwritten in the repo.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated primary color palette to a new red theme across multiple sections (Hero, Service Tiers, Contact Form, global styles, Tailwind config).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is only about placing the uploaded logo asset at a specific path; it explicitly lists redesigning colors/typography as a non-goal.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HeroSection.tsx: "updated to use the new red primary color"; ServiceTiersSection.tsx; ContactFormSection.tsx; index.css; tailwind.config.js)

hallucinated_features.description: Changed logo sizing/fit behavior in header/footer (larger logo box; object-fit changed to contain; removed scale transform).
hallucinated_features.reason: Changing logo sizing/fit behavior is listed as a non-goal unless required to address the missing-image issue; the request focuses on fixing the missing asset at the referenced path, not altering rendering behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SiteHeader.tsx: "logo now renders in a slightly larger (w-14 h-14)"; SiteFooter.tsx: "fills more of the available space"; index.css: "object-fit: contain (instead of cover)" and "removes the scale transform")
